Posts.Content: kmorin15 wrote: I WOULD LIKE TO TAKE THIS TIME TO THANK ALL OF THE WOUNDERFUL LADIES WHO GOT ME THROUGH THIS. ALL OF THE QUESTION BIG OR SMALL. YOU WERE THERE. MY JOURNEY THROUGH THIS HAS GONE VERY FAST FOR ME. INVASIVE LOBULAR ER POSITIVE STAGE II TI NI MO DX IN NOVEMBER 05 WITH LUMPECTOMY 2ND MARGIN DECEMBER 05 MASTECTOMY MAY 06 (WOULD HAVE BEEN FEBRUARY BUT HAD AUTO ACCT) CHEMO 4 A/C 4 TAXOL EVERY OTHER WEEK JUNE TO OCTOBER 06 PORT OUT NOVEMBER 23, 06 RECONSTRUCTION NOVEMBER 30TH O6 BOTH SIDES HYSTERECTOMY JANUARY 30, 07 NOW ON TOMOXIFIN CHEMO WAS NOT HARD FOR ME IF WAS ONE OF THE LUCKEY ONES THE DOC'S I HAD WERE GREAT AT RHODE ISLAND HOSPITAL BUT MOST OF ALL ALL OF YOU GOT ME THROUGH TO ALL THE NEWBIES OUT THERE. READ AND LISTEN TO ALL OF THESE LOVELY LADIES HERE. THEY WILL HELP ALL THEY CAN WITH THEIR KNOWLEGE AND THERE EXPERIENCES.WHEN I STARTED I DID NOT THINK I WOULD EVER GET TO THE END I WOULD NEVER KNOW AS MUCH AS THEY DID. BUT BECAUSE OF ALL OF THEM I MADE IT AND I AM ON THE OTHER SIDE. YOU TO CAN MAKE IT WITH THEIR STRENGTH AND SUPPORT THANK YOU AGAIN TO ALL OF YOU WOUNDERFUL LADIES OUT THERE WHO HELPED ME GET THROUGH THIS TIME OF WORRIES AND FEARS. KATHIE RHODE ISLAND Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: THANK YOU ALL kmorin15 LiveForToday
